articles.title: From Diamond Rain to Hidden Oceans: The True Secrets of Uranus and Neptune - SciTechDaily
articles.description: New research at UC Berkeley offers a fresh perspective on Uranus and Neptune's interiors, indicating layered structures of water and hydrocarbons. These findings account for the planets' unusual magnetic fields and are supported by simulations showing that ex…
articles.content: An exploded view of an ice giant planet such as Uranus or Neptune. A new theory proposes that below the dense atmosphere lies a water-rich layer (blue) that has separated from a deeper layer of hot, … [+8459 chars]

articles.title: Reversing Time From Within: Can Gut Bacteria Delay Aging? - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The gut microbiome profoundly influences aging, and its modulation may support healthy aging and disease prevention. Aging is a universal and intricate process impacting all living organisms, marked by key genetic features like telomere shortening, genomic in…
